titleStmt.title: The embassador between heauen and earth, betweene God and man. Or A booke of heauenly and healthy meditations and prayers for earthly and sickly soules and sinners Fit to be borne in the hand, and worne in the heart of euery good Christian. By W.C. preacher of the word.
titleStmt.author: Crashaw, William, 1572-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. O[kes] for Lenard Becket and are to be sold at his shop in the Inner Temple,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Inner Temple
